Title: The Inheritance
Plot: Betty visits her father; Paul's girlfriend tries to convince him to prioritize his duties; Pete's mother disapproves of his and Trudy's idea.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Matthew Weiner, Lisa Albert, Marti Noxon
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Darby Stanchfield, Eric Ladin, Rich Hutchman
